recycle.config.auto_clean_time.tooltip: How often the mod automatically cleans up dropped items. Default: 600 seconds (10 minutes)
recycle.config.show_cleanup_warnings.too: Whether to show warning messages before cleaning up items (60s, 30s, 10s countdown)
recycle.config.warning_message.tooltip: Message template for cleanup warnings. Use {time} for remaining seconds
Message shown after cleanup finishes. Use {count} to show number of items cleaned
recycle.config.trash_box_size.tooltip: Number of slots in each trash box. Must be multiple of 9 (9-108)
recycle.config.dimension_trash_allow_put: Allow players to manually put their own items into dimension trash boxes
recycle.config.supported_dimensions.tool: List of dimensions that will have trash boxes created
recycle.config.max_boxes_per_dimension.t: Maximum number of trash boxes per dimension (1-5)
recycle.config.auto_create_dimension_tra: Automatically create trash boxes for new dimensions
recycle.config.payment_item_type.tooltip: What item to use as payment for cross-dimension access
recycle.config.cross_dimension_access_co: Payment required to access other dimension trash boxes
recycle.config.only_clean_listed_items.t: If enabled, only items in the 'Always Clean' list will be cleaned
recycle.config.always_clean_items.toolti: List of items that will always be cleaned up (blacklist mode)
recycle.config.never_clean_items.tooltip: List of items that will never be cleaned up (whitelist)
recycle.config.clean_projectiles.tooltip: Enable cleaning up projectiles that can cause lag
recycle.config.projectile_types_to_clean: Types of projectiles to clean up (arrows, fireballs, etc.)
recycle.config.too_many_items_warning.to: Warn when a chunk has more than this many items
recycle.config.auto_stop_chunk_loading.t: Automatically stop chunk loading when chunk has too many items
recycle.config.too_many_items_warning_me: Warning message template for too many items
recycle.config.ui_max_quick_move.tooltip: Maximum items to move at once with Shift+Click
recycle.config.item_stack_merge_limit.to: Maximum stack size when merging items in trash boxes
recycle.config.cmd_help_header.tooltip: Header text for command help display
recycle.config.cmd_help_test.tooltip: Help text for the test command
recycle.config.cmd_help_open.tooltip: Help text for the open command
recycle.config.cmd_help_current.tooltip: Help text for the current dimension command
recycle.config.test_box_title.tooltip: Title template for test trash boxes. Use {ui_type} for UI type
recycle.config.test_box_opened.tooltip: Message when test box is opened. Use {ui_type} for UI type
recycle.config.item_count_display.toolti: Template for item count display. Use {count} for item count
